name: Rogue Harvest (itch)
description:
Rogue Harvest is a finely crafted Rogue-like Open World Crafting game.
- Explore a massive procedurally generated world
- Chop down trees, mine stone, dig up the earth, farm and harvest crops
- Fight off enemies from small foes to large bosses
- Simple & Fun game mechanics
- Craft and build the world around you
- Advance your skills & abilities - level up naturally
- Survive the elements & the beasts that roam the land scape
- Full day and night cycle
- Plant seeds and build a farm, but watch out for the bunnies...
- Perma-death with incentives and value in each playthrough

The entire world is procedurally generated and will keep you surprised through out your adventure. You will never play the same game.

This game features full permanent death ( permadeath ) and is at times very challenging, however every battle fought, every night survived will make you feel extremely accomplished!

Rogue Harvest will continue to be developed & updated - New & Free Content will regularly be added to the game.
